translations: 苯丙胺，安非他明（解除忧郁、疲劳的药）

sentences.sentence: In addition, the use of new drugs can temporarily alleviate the HIV/AIDS related depression, fatigue and fear, so HIV/AIDS patients increased the abuse of amphetamine-type stimulants.
sentences.translation: 此外，新型毒品具有暂时缓解HIV/AIDS引起的相关抑郁、疲劳和恐惧等作用，促使HIV感染者及AIDS病人更多使用新型毒品。
